TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Network extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于与计算机所连接的网络进行交互的属性、事件和方法。

span.span: Provides a property, event, and methods for interacting with the network to which the computer is connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了涉及对象的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network` 。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network` object. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上传文件How to: Upload a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file)| |下载文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file)| |检查连接状态Check connection status|[如何：检查连接状态How to: Check Connection Status](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传 `Order.txt` 到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` 。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. summary.span: 下载指定的远程文件，并将其保存到指定位置。

span.span: Downloads the specified remote file and saves it in the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标文件已存在，则该 `DownloadFile` 方法将不会覆盖现有文件。If the destination file already exists, the `DownloadFile` method will not overwrite the existing file. 您可以使用方法的其他重载之一 来指示它覆盖现有文件、提供用户凭据或指定特定超时值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to instruct it to overwrite existing files, provide user credentials, or specify a specific timeout value. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时输出跟踪信息。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [启用网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不发送可选的 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 某些服务器可能会 (内部服务器错误返回 500) 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选的标头，必须使用类构造请求 。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |下载文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file)| ## Examples 此示例从下载文件 `WineList.txt` `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` ，并将其保存到 `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents` 。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例从下载文件 `WineList.txt` ， `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` 并将其保存到 `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents` ，指定超时间隔为500毫秒。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `showUI` 设置为 `True` ，则会显示一个对话框，其中显示操作的进度; 对话框包含可用于取消操作的 " **取消** " 按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 此对话框不是模式对话框，因此不会阻止用户在程序中输入其他窗口。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器未在指定的内响应 `connectionTimeout` ，则取消操作，并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时输出跟踪信息。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [启用网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不发送可选的 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 某些服务器可能会 (内部服务器错误返回 500) 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选的标头，必须使用类构造请求 。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议以纯文本形式发送信息（包括密码），且不应用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |下载文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file)| ## Examples 此示例从下载文件 `WineList.txt` `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` ，并将其保存到 `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents` 。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例从下载文件 `WineList.txt` ， `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` 并将其保存到 `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents` ，指定超时间隔为500毫秒。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `showUI` 设置为 `True` ，则会显示一个对话框，其中显示操作的进度; 对话框包含可用于取消操作的 " **取消** " 按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 此对话框不是模式对话框，因此不会阻止用户在程序中输入其他窗口。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器未在指定的内响应 `connectionTimeout` ，则取消操作，并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时输出跟踪信息。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [启用网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不发送可选的 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 某些服务器可能会 (内部服务器错误返回 500) 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选的标头，必须使用类构造请求 。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议以纯文本形式发送信息（包括密码），且不应用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |下载文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file)| ## .event class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler NetworkAvailabilityChanged
Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler
public: event Microsoft::VisualBasic::Devices::NetworkAvailableEventHandler ^ NetworkAvailabilityChanged;
member this.NetworkAvailabilityChanged : Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler

summary.span: 在网络可用性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `NetworkAvailabilityChanged`每次网络的可用性发生变化时，应用程序都会引发事件。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time the availability of the network changes. 可以使用参数的 属性 `e` 来获取网络连接的新状态。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要获取网络连接的当前状态，请使用 属性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中，将在应用程序的主线程上使用其他用户界面事件引发此事件。In a Windows Forms application, this event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这样，事件处理程序便可以直接访问应用程序的用户界面。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 但是，如果在引发此事件时，应用程序正在忙于处理另一个用户界面事件，则在其他事件处理程序完成或调用方法之前，将无法处理此事件 。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 不能使用 `Handles` 语句来处理 `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` 事件; 必须使用 `AddHandler` 语句。You cannot use the `Handles` statement to handle the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event; you must use the `AddHandler` statement. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中， `MyApplication` 对象公开一个 `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` 事件，该事件提供与此事件相同的功能，但你可以使用语句对其进行处理 `Handles` 。In Windows Forms applications, the `MyApplication` object exposes a `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event that provides the same functionality as this event, but you can handle it with the `Handles` statement. > [!NOTE] > 许多网络集线器都提供网络连接，即使集线器与较大的网络断开连接也是如此。Many network hubs provide a network connection, even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，对于有线连接，此事件表示计算机和中心之间的连接发生更改。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates a change in the connection between the computer and a hub. ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` 事件来更新窗体或控件的用户界面。This example uses the `My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event to update the user interface of a form or control. 此代码应位于具有名为的窗体或控件中 `Label1` 。This code should to be in a form or control that has a named `Label1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Ping`方法不是用于确定远程计算机的可用性的防故障方法：目标计算机上的 ping 端口可能已关闭，或者 ping 请求可能被防火墙或路由器阻止。The `Ping` method is not a fail-safe method for determining the availability of a remote computer: the ping port on the target computer may be turned off or the ping request may be blocked by a firewall or router. 传递给方法的地址 `Ping` 必须是 DNS 可解析的，并且不能以 "http://" 开头。The address passed to the `Ping` method must be DNS resolvable and cannot be preceded by "http://". ## Examples 此示例通过确定方法是否返回来报告是否可以 ping 服务器 `Ping` `True` 。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returns `True`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 将替换为 `"198.01.01.01"` 要 ping 的服务器的 IP 地址、URL 或计算机名。Replace `"198.01.01.01"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping. 此示例通过确定 `Ping` 方法是否返回 `True` 并指定了1000毫秒的超时间隔，来报告是否可以 ping 服务器。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returned `True` and specifies a timeout interval of 1000 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 将替换为 `"www.cohowinery.com"` 要 ping 的服务器的 IP 地址、URL 或计算机名。Replace `"www.cohowinery.com"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.

[!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 将替换为 `"198.01.01.01"` 要 ping 的服务器的 IP 地址、URL 或计算机名。Replace `"198.01.01.01"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping. 此示例通过确定 `Ping` 方法是否返回 `True` 并指定了1000毫秒的超时间隔，来报告是否可以 ping 服务器。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returned `True` and specifies a timeout interval of 1000 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 将替换为 `"www.cohowinery.com"` 要 ping 的服务器的 IP 地址、URL 或计算机名。Replace `"www.cohowinery.com"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法的其他重载之一 来提供用户凭据或指定特定超时值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to provide user credentials or specify a specific timeout value. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时输出跟踪信息。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [启用网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing). 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上传文件How to: Upload a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传 `Order.txt` 到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` 。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 此示例在不提供用户名或密码的情况下将文件 `Order.txt` 上传到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`显示了上传操作的进度，并将将超时间隔为 500 毫秒。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `showUI` 设置为，则会 `True` 显示一个对话框，其中包含一个 " **取消** " 按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来取消操作。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation. 因为对话框不是模式对话框，所以它不会阻止用户在程序中输入其他窗口。Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器未在中指定的间隔内响应 `connectionTimeout` ，则取消操作并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时输出跟踪信息。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [启用网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing). > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议以纯文本形式发送信息（包括密码），且不应用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |功能To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上传文件How to: Upload a File](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传 `Order.txt` 到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` 。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 此示例在不提供用户名或密码的情况下将文件 `Order.txt` 上传到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`显示了上传操作的进度，并将将超时间隔为 500 毫秒。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

[!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 此示例在不提供用户名或密码的情况下将文件 `Order.txt` 上传到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`显示了上传操作的进度，并将将超时间隔为 500 毫秒。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
